content.description: Start as for the problem Sloppy Seconds, but move right and up eventually using a right hand sidepull rib to get to the jug finish.
content.location: This problem is located on A Block.

content.description: Sit start around the corner about 4 feet right of the problem Robotic Sex, and make two hard crimpy moves to an easy finish.
content.location: This problem is located on A Block.

content.description: Sit start with two really crimpy holds and use the rock fin for feet. Move up right and then left to a slopey topout.
content.location: This problem is located on B Block.

content.description: Sit start matched on cool sloper feature. Move left to the arete and up.
content.location: This problem is located on the left side of A Block next to a tree.

content.description: Sit start with a good right crimp/pinch and a low left crimp. Move left hand to an small triangular pinch and then throw right hand to a flat, smooth hold and topout.
content.location: This problem is located on C Block.

content.description: Sit start 3 feet left of the problem Drill Hole matched on the obvious sloper gaston and move-up to the arete and finish.
content.location: This is on D Block.

content.description: Sit start matched on a good low edge and bump right to a good crimp and move up the slopey left arete.
content.location: This problem is located on the left arete of D Block.

content.description: Sit start as for the problem Crimpfest, but move right around the arete onto the face using some crimpy holds.
content.location: This is on A Block the far right arete.

content.description: Sit start with a tiny left crimp and a decent right incut crimp roughly between the problems Room Service and Going Commando. Power up to a tiny left crimp and then to the slopey arete.
content.location: This is on D Block.

content.description: Sit start on the far left arete as for the problem A Better Mousetrap, and make continous hard moves all the way right to gain the finish of the problem Crimpfest.
content.location: This problem is located on A Block.

content.description: Sit start the rounded arete and climb straight up. It is a classic problem.
content.location: This problem is located on the right arete of C Block.

content.description: Sit start about 4-5 feet left of the problem Drill Hole with your left foot on a good, detached rock, your left hand in a barely visible dish, and your right hand on the obvious feature. Move up and use two sets of sidepulls to slap left to the arete and topout as for the problem Rack Rider.
content.location: This problem is located on D Block.

content.description: Sit start as for the problem Crimpfest, but instead of climbing straight up, break left into the center of the steepness eventually dynoing to a flat shelf out left.
content.location: This is on A Block at the right arete.

content.description: Stand start about 4-5 feet left of the problem Crimpfest, and climb the center of the wall finishing by making a cool dyno to a distant left shelf.Â
content.location: This is on A Block.

content.description: Sit start and move up to match on a cool, slopey feature. Then make a crux pinch on the arete to top out.
content.location: On the backside of A Block, this is the left arete.

content.description: Sit start matched on a black crimpbar with crappy feet. Move up the obvious feature on the left and go for the top.
content.location: On the backside of A Block, this is the route up the center of the wall.

content.description: Sit start and climb the arete topping out using the drill hole hold.
content.location: This problem is located on the right arete of D Block.

content.description: Sit start the far right end of the boulder. Power up and slightly left through a series of crimps and grab a cool right pinch and top out pretty much straight up.
content.location: This problem is located on A Block.

content.description: Sit start and make body tension moves up to top out.
content.location: Facing the backside of A Block, this is the right arete.

content.description: Sit start about 2-3 feet left of the problem The Score with a higher thin left crimp and a lower, flat right crimp and crap feet. Power up and get the small, triangular crimp/pinch with your right hand and then gaston a distant sidepull with your left and power up to finish.
content.location: This problem is located on C Block.

content.description: Sit start on the left arete and climb the stunning wave above you.
content.location: This problem is located on C Block.

content.description: Sit start and head right a few moves, and then up eventually bumping up to the cool button hold with your right hand and topout.
content.location: This problem starts at the arete about 7-8 feet right of the problem Walking on Sunshine.

content.description:
A Block is a big boulder and the main attraction as it has some good, hard problems. B Block is smaller and not so great.

 These are two boulders next to each other. A Block is located about 20 feet above B Block.
